name: All-in
description:
*All-in is a game made for a university GameJam* **Game mechanics are difficult to understand and the tutorial needs more information** ***Still hope you'll enjoy it*** ****Too much asterix**** DESCRIPTION:

All-in was made during a Game Jam.  It's the story of Jacky, who sold his soul to satan and wanders in an endless grim casino. The goal is to retrieve all the items that will make him recover his memories. In All-in there is a unique mechanics, based on the blackjack game. Every time you over-damage an enemy, you lose the number difference. So don't bust the foes health and watch out for the enemy type.

HOW TO PLAY:

W,A,S,D to move.

Shift to dodge.

Left click to throw card

GOAL:

Kill the nests

Collect the story items

Get to the portal room
